job.title: Software Engineer, Data Products
job.description: strongCome help us build the worlds most reliable ondemand logistics engine for delivery Were bringing on talented engineers to help us create and maintain a 24x7 no downtime global infrastructure system that powers DoorDashs threesided marketplace of consumers merchants and dashersbrbrstrongstronguAbout The TeambrbrustrongThe Data Products team is a part of the Data Platform organization and is responsible for building innovative big data applications and tools for teams across DoorDash to extract insights from business and operational datasets As the volume variety and velocity of the data increases at DoorDash there is a wide range of data challenges that need to be solved such as data discovery and lineage data quality data governance amp compliance and standardization and accessing of important business metrics Another interesting challenge to solve is how to make it extremely easy quickly for our data users to access visualize and extract insights from the ever increasing datasetsbrbrstronguWhat Youll AchievebrustrongulliYou will work alongside our Data Analysts Data Scientists and rest of the data user community to understand their needs and come up with innovative data products to address those needsliliYou will own design and implement scalable and reliable backend infrastructure of the data productsliliYou will explore the latest big data trends technologies and techniques to come up with solutions for complex data challengesbrliulstronguAbout YoubrustrongulliPassionate about big data technologies and building scalable reliable and easy to use infrastructure amp applicationsliliHighenergy and confident  youll do whatever it takes to winliliYoure an owner  driven focused and quick to take ownership of your workliliHumble  youre willing to jump in and youre open to feedbackliliAdaptable resilient and able to thrive in ambiguity  things change quickly in our fastpaced startup and youll need to be able to keep upliliGrowthminded  youre eager to expand your skill set and excited to carve out your career path in a hypergrowth settingliliDesire for impact  ready to take on a lot of responsibility and work collaboratively with your teambrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulliBS MS or PhD in Computer Science or equivalentliliExceptionally strong knowledge of CS fundamental concepts and OOP languageslili4 years of industry experienceliliExperience working with largescale and complex data computation pipelinesliliExperience in Big Data technologies eg Apache Spark Elasticsearch Presto Apache Flink Snowflake etcliliExperience improving efficiency scalability and stability of system resourcesliliSystems Engineering  youve built meaningful pieces of infrastructure in a cloud computing environment Bonus if those were data processing systems or distributed systemsbrliulstrongNice To HavesbrstrongulliExperience with realtime stream processing challengesliliEngage with or contribute to Big Data related open source projectsliliFamiliar with a cloud based environment such as AWSbrliulstronguAbout UsbrbrustrongFounded in 2013 DoorDash is a San Franciscobased technology company passionate about transforming local businesses and dedicated to enabling new ways of working earning and living Today DoorDash connects customers with their favorite local and national businesses in more than 850 cities across the United States and Canada By building intelligent lastmile delivery technology for local cities DoorDash aims to connect people with the things they care about  one dash at a timebrbrstrongOur Commitment to Diversity and InclusionbrbrstrongWere committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company industry and cities Thats why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of the best and brightest from all backgrounds experiences and perspectives We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools resources and opportunity to excelbrbrstrongLinks amp ReferencesbrstrongulliHow DoorDash is Scaling its Data Platform to Delight Customers and Meet our Growing DemandliliSupercharging DoorDashs Marketplace DecisionMaking with RealTime KnowledgeliliOptimizing DoorDashs Marketing Spend with Machine LearningbrliulPursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance and any other state or local hiring regulations we will consider for employment any qualified applicant including those with arrest and conviction records in a manner consistent with the applicable regulationlbrbr
